reviewText:
WHEN I CLICKED THE ITEM TO MOVE IT TO MY CART, THE PRICE WAS 15.44 
CHECKING THE CHARGE ON MY CREDIT CARD REVEALED THAT I'VE BEEN CHARGED 29.61
WRITING ABOUT IT TO AMAZON DIDN'T HELP.
AS FOR THE DVD ITSELF, THE COLLECTION OF THE SONGS IS REALLY FANTASTIC, BUT THERE WAS NO ATTEMPT TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF THE CLIP OR THE SOUND.
VERY SHALLOW

Excellent collection of Shocking Blue video performances. I was pleased to see that they let the songs play until finished,without interfering with the music with interviews. This DVD will only play on Region- free DVD players or All- Region DVD players! It is an import from Holland, and is Region 2 ONLY!(It will NOT play on American DVD players)
J.K.
